property.name: Action
property.helpHtml: Sets the action to be performed when the condition is met. The options include moving forward or backwards a page in your form, copying a form id and copying a form value.

property.name: Source
property.getValuesFunction: // return the list of all controls on the page with the one for this action selected return "<option value=''>Please select...</option>" + getFormValueOptions(this.dataSource);
property.helpHtml: Sets the source control for where the form value is being copied from.

property.name: Destination
property.getValuesFunction: // return the list of all controls on the page with the one for this action selected return "<option value=''>Please select...</option>" + getOutputOptions(this.dataDestination);
property.helpHtml: Sets the destination for where the form value is being copied to.
